author: Family Account
comment: I love this. Understated, clean, efficient. Would have 5 stars if the date format could change to DDMMYYYY.

author: William Wallis
comment: This works well and I really like the idea, but it will randomly decide when to show the date.

reply.author: Jordon Smith
reply.content:
Thanks for the review William, the date should only show when the watch is not in ambient mode and you have no peeking cards.

If you're after more customisation have a look at Jagger (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jaggerface) which displays the time in the same format but is customisable.

comment: Good concept and clean presentation but misleading name. Provide for actual hex representation and I'll give five stars.
